Trisquel GNU/Linux

Trisquel is a GNU/Linux and is a Free (Swatantra/Libre/Freedom) Software.

Just like Parabola, its also listed in on official GNU page as GNU/Linux distribution.

Trisquel, a GNU/Linux distribution based on Ubuntu that’s oriented toward small enterprises, domestic users and educational centers.

Yet another Free alternatives for users using Ubuntu (Ubuntu is not a Free Software).

Here is a snapshot when booted from live-usb.

Another good thing about Trisquel 7.0 is its LTS and hence will be supported for next 5 years (Till 2019/2020).
